pageSetting.title: 机构违规积分查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select wg.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,shccbs,coalesce(xtzqywl,0)+coalesce(sgzhywl,0) as ywlbs, (case when coalesce(xtzqywl,0)+coalesce(sgzhywl,0)=0 then 0 else shccbs/(coalesce(xtzqywl,0)+coalesce(sgzhywl,0))*100 end) as ccl, shwgkf,fxyjx,fxzcx, (case when fxyjx=0 then 0 else fxzcx/fxyjx*100 end) as fxzcl, fxyjkf,qtwgx,qtzgx, (case when qtwgx=0 then 0 else qtzgx/qtwgx*100 end) as qtzgl, qttgx, (case when qtzgx=0 then 0 else qttgx/qtzgx*100 end) as qttgl, qtzgkf, shwgkf+fxyjkf+qtzgkf as kfhj, jg.khdxdh from ( select sjw.tjrq,cy.jgkhdxdh,sum(coalesce(shccbs,0)) shccbs,sum(coalesce(shwgkf,0)) shwgkf, sum(coalesce(fxyjx,0)) fxyjx,sum(coalesce(qtwgx,0)) qtwgx,sum(coalesce(fxzcx,0)) fxzcx, sum(coalesce(fxyjkf,0)) fxyjkf,sum(coalesce(qtzgx,0)) qtzgx,sum(coalesce(qttgx,0)) qttgx, sum(coalesce(qtzgkf,0)) qtzgkf from khdx_hy hy inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join ( select sj.wgrq,sj.wghy,sum(1) as shccbs,sum(coalesce(sj.kf,0)) as shwgkf from wgjf_wgsjdj sj inner join wgjf_wgxm xm on sj.wgxmdh=xm.wgxmdh and sj.wgrq between xm.qsrq and xm.jsrq where xm.wgxlb='001' and sj.wgrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by sj.wgrq,sj.wghy ) sh on cy.khdxdh=sh.wghy and sjw.tjrq=sh.wgrq left join ( select yj.yjrq,yj.yjzrr,sum(1) as fxyjx, sum(case when yj.cljg='1' then 1 else 0 end) as fxzcx, sum(coalesce(yj.kf,0)) as fxyjkf from wgjf_yjsjdj yj where yj.yjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by yj.yjrq,yj.yjzrr ) fx on cy.khdxdh=fx.yjzrr and sjw.tjrq=fx.yjrq left join ( select sj.wgrq,sj.wghy,sum(1) as qtwgx, sum(case when sj.czqk='1' then 1 else 0 end) as qtzgx, sum(case when sj.czjg='1' then 1 else 0 end) as qttgx, sum(coalesce(sj.kf,0)) as qtzgkf from wgjf_wgsjdj sj inner join wgjf_wgxm xm on sj.wgxmdh=xm.wgxmdh and sj.wgrq between xm.qsrq and xm.jsrq where xm.wgxlb='003' and sj.wgrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by sj.wgrq,sj.wghy ) qt on cy.khdxdh=qt.wghy and qt.wgrq=sjw.tjrq group by sjw.tjrq,cy.jgkhdxdh) wg inner join khdx_jg jg on wg.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh left join ( select tjrq,khdxdh,sum(xtzqywl) xtzqywl,sum(sgzhywl) sgzhywl from nbzz_jgkh_ywl where tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by tjrq,khdxdh) ywl on ywl.tjrq=wg.tjrq and wg.jgkhdxdh=ywl.khdxdh where shccbs+fxyjx+qtwgx<>0

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select wg.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,shccbs,coalesce(xtzqywl,0)+coalesce(sgzhywl,0) as ywlbs, (case when coalesce(xtzqywl,0)+coalesce(sgzhywl,0)=0 then 0 else shccbs/(coalesce(xtzqywl,0)+coalesce(sgzhywl,0))*100 end) as ccl, shwgkf,fxyjx,fxzcx, (case when fxyjx=0 then 0 else fxzcx/fxyjx*100 end) as fxzcl, fxyjkf,qtwgx,qtzgx, (case when qtwgx=0 then 0 else qtzgx/qtwgx*100 end) as qtzgl, qttgx, (case when qtzgx=0 then 0 else qttgx/qtzgx*100 end) as qttgl, qtzgkf, shwgkf+fxyjkf+qtzgkf as kfhj, jg.khdxdh from ( select sjw.tjrq,cy.jgkhdxdh,sum(coalesce(shccbs,0)) shccbs,sum(coalesce(shwgkf,0)) shwgkf, sum(coalesce(fxyjx,0)) fxyjx,sum(coalesce(qtwgx,0)) qtwgx,sum(coalesce(fxzcx,0)) fxzcx, sum(coalesce(fxyjkf,0)) fxyjkf,sum(coalesce(qtzgx,0)) qtzgx,sum(coalesce(qttgx,0)) qttgx, sum(coalesce(qtzgkf,0)) qtzgkf from khdx_hy hy inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join ( select sj.wgrq,sj.wghy,sum(1) as shccbs,sum(coalesce(sj.kf,0)) as shwgkf from wgjf_wgsjdj sj inner join wgjf_wgxm xm on sj.wgxmdh=xm.wgxmdh and sj.wgrq between xm.qsrq and xm.jsrq where xm.wgxlb='001' and sj.wgrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by sj.wgrq,sj.wghy ) sh on cy.khdxdh=sh.wghy and sjw.tjrq=sh.wgrq left join ( select yj.yjrq,yj.yjzrr,sum(1) as fxyjx, sum(case when yj.cljg='1' then 1 else 0 end) as fxzcx, sum(coalesce(yj.kf,0)) as fxyjkf from wgjf_yjsjdj yj where yj.yjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by yj.yjrq,yj.yjzrr ) fx on cy.khdxdh=fx.yjzrr and sjw.tjrq=fx.yjrq left join ( select sj.wgrq,sj.wghy,sum(1) as qtwgx, sum(case when sj.czqk='1' then 1 else 0 end) as qtzgx, sum(case when sj.czjg='1' then 1 else 0 end) as qttgx, sum(coalesce(sj.kf,0)) as qtzgkf from wgjf_wgsjdj sj inner join wgjf_wgxm xm on sj.wgxmdh=xm.wgxmdh and sj.wgrq between xm.qsrq and xm.jsrq where xm.wgxlb='003' and sj.wgrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by sj.wgrq,sj.wghy ) qt on cy.khdxdh=qt.wghy and qt.wgrq=sjw.tjrq group by sjw.tjrq,cy.jgkhdxdh) wg inner join khdx_jg jg on wg.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh left join ( select tjrq,khdxdh,sum(xtzqywl) xtzqywl,sum(sgzhywl) sgzhywl from nbzz_jgkh_ywl where tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ group by tjrq,khdxdh) ywl on ywl.tjrq=wg.tjrq and wg.jgkhdxdh=ywl.khdxdh where shccbs+fxyjx+qtwgx<>0 ) t
